wind/news/style/custom/manner/CL:陣|阵[zhen4],絲|丝[si1]

sentences.english: The gardener told the king about the wind-deer.
sentences.chinese: 园丁把风鹿的事告诉了国王。

sentences.english: However, no one can stop the wind.
sentences.chinese: 但是没有人能把风停下来。

sentences.english: Man broke the sun, pulled the wind down.
But no one can stop the wind.
sentences.chinese: 但是没有人能把风停下来。

sentences.english: The wind scattered the ships sank into the sea, dandelion.
sentences.chinese: 巨浪把风之帆船打散了，蒲公英沉入了海中。
